content.query:
CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE Mydatasource012
WITH
(
    LOCATION = 'https://pythonstorageaccount01.blob.core.windows.net/gold/'
);

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE GOLD.Sales
(
    OrderDate DATE, 
    StockDate DATETIME2, 
    OrderNumber NVARCHAR(50), 
    ProductKey INT, 
    CustomerKey INT, 
    TerritoryKey INT, 
    OrderLineItem INT,      
    OrderQuantity INT,
    years INT,
    Total_numberof_items INT
)
WITH
(
    LOCATION = 'Adventureworks_Sales',
    DATA_SOURCE = Mydatasource012,
    FILE_FORMAT = myfileformat
);
